Package managment

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApproveAcountController
    This class is used to Approve accounts by BM manager The controller loads all business account sto approve if theres users to approve he adds them to an accordion once a user has been approved he is removed from that accordion if there are no users to approve the message no business accounts to approve will be displayed
    ChangeUserStatusController
    this class is used to display a table where we can change a users status from active to frozen to deleted and so on
    EmployerRecordController
    This class recives data from MyEmployersController, its purpose is to set each employer to it's correct accordion(users that need to be approved to waiting_for_approval_accordion) users that have been approved to the approved_accordion we do this by setting the employers address and telephone and loading this MyEmployersRecord FXML file into My EmployerScreen FXML
    MyEmployersController
    This class is used for approving employers by BM, here he can view all employers that he has approved along with employer that still need to be approved
    NewOrderScreenController
    Class for viewing a restuarants new orders that have been recived, or orders that are in the making , or orders that have already been completed we do this with 3 accordions we move between to display to the user the orders status (new,ready to deliver,history)
    RegistarRestaurantController
    Class for registering a supplier, BM registers the restaurant by inputting it's address,city and type You can only register a supplier that is in the users table from import users by outer function
    RegNewAccountP1Controller
    Controller for registering an account , in this controller we register account details and later move on to RegNewAccountP2 to complete the registration process
    RegNewAccountP2Controller
    Class for the second part of user registration here the user entersr private account details or business account details, once user presses create the account is created data for account is taken from P1 Controller.
    RegNewEmployerController
    Class for registering a new employer in this class BM inputs an employer to register and approves that employer
    SMSSimulationController
    Class for simulating sms We simply set the label in our SMS screen to be the message we send from other conotrollers * @author matan weisberg
    UserAlreadyHasAccountController
    controller for Useralreadyhasaccountscreen we get to this screen via hpyer link in RegNewAccountP1 here a user inputs ID for an account that already exists if the id is linked to an account user can move to RegNewAccountP2 without reentering account details
    UserLoginController
    Controller for user login screen here we allow users to log in via username and password only after accounts have been imported by outside user import
